page.name: Unit 4 Video
page.content:
For this video, you will need the Unit 4 Handouts located here or on the main course page. These handouts include the Unit 4: Pause and Think Handout and Video Observation Task: Effective Grouping Strategies. For the fillable PDFs, please be sure to save your PDF before closing the document in order to keep your notes. Finally, please click here to access the video and visual transcripts.

After you view this presentation, return to the main course page to complete the Extended Practice Activity on Differentiated Instruction and to find the Unit References and Recommended Resources. See you in Unit 5.
